VLAN_INTERFACE_IPPREFIX_MUST_CONDITION_F.desc: Vlan Interface Ip-prefix must condition failure.

INCORRECT_VLAN_NAME.desc: INCORRECT VLAN_NAME FIELD IN VLAN TABLE.

INVALID_LONG_VLAN_NAME.desc: INVALID VLAN_NAME FIELD IN VLAN TABLE.

WRONG_FAMILY_WITH_IP_PREFIX.desc: Configure Wrong family with ip-prefix for VLAN_Interface Table

DHCP_SERVER_INCORRECT_FORMAT.desc: Add dhcp_server which is not in correct ip-prefix format.

DHCPV6_SERVER_INCORRECT_FORMAT.desc: Add dhcpv6_server which is not in correct ipv6-address format.

VLAN_WITH_NON_EXIST_PORT.desc: Configure a member port in VLAN_MEMBER table which does not exist.

VLAN_WITH_PORTCHANNEL_MEMBER.desc: Configure a PortChannel as a member of Vlan.

VLAN_WITH_NON_EXIST_PORTCHANNEL_MEMBER.desc: Configure a non existent PortChannel as a member of Vlan.

VLAN_MEMEBER_WITH_NON_EXIST_VLAN.desc: Configure vlan-id in VLAN_MEMBER table which does not exist in VLAN  table.

VLAN_INTERFACE_WRONG_NAT_ZONE_RANGE.desc: Configure wrong value for nat zone.
VLAN_INTERFACE_WRONG_NAT_ZONE_RANGE.eStr: Invalid nat zone for the vlan interface.

VLAN_INTERFACE_VALID_NAT_ZONE_RANGE.desc: Configure valid value for nat zone.

VLAN_INTERFACE_INVALID_LOOPBACK_ACTION.desc: INCORRECT LOOPBACK ACTION IN VLAN_INTERFACE TABLE.

VLAN_INTERFACE_INVALID_ENABLE_IPV6_LINK_.desc: Enable the ipv6 link-local as true.

VLAN_INTERFACE_UPPER_MAC_ADDR.desc: Set UPPERCASE administrator-provided interface mac address.

VLAN_CREATE_VLAN_WITH_MISSMATCHING_NAME.desc: Create Vlan so that name doesn't match id
VLAN_CREATE_VLAN_WITH_MISSMATCHING_NAME.eStr: The vlanid must correspond to the VLAN name

IP_PREFIX_WITHOUT_CREATNG_VLAN.desc: Create IP on not created Vlan

MIRROR_SESSION_ON_VLAN_MEMBER_PORT.desc: Set mirror dst port to a Vlan member
MIRROR_SESSION_ON_VLAN_MEMBER_PORT.eStr: Port is used as a destination port in a mirror session

VLAN_ADD_PORT_CHANNEL_MEMBER.desc: Add port channel member to Vlan
VLAN_ADD_PORT_CHANNEL_MEMBER.eStr: Port is a member of a port channel

VLAN_ADD_PORT_THAT_IS_UNTAGGED.desc: Add port that is already untagged
VLAN_ADD_PORT_THAT_IS_UNTAGGED.eStr: Port can be untagged in at most one VLAN

VLAN_ADD_PORT_THAT_IS_ROUTER_INTERFACE.desc: Add to Vlan port that is router interface

VLAN_INTERFACE_WITH_VNET_AND_IP_PREFIXES.desc: Configure a VLAN interface with VNET and both IPv4 and IPv6 prefixes.

VLAN_INTERFACE_WITH_INVALID_VNET_NAME_RE.desc: Configure a VLAN interface with reference to a non-existent VNET.

VLAN_INTERFACE_WITH_MISSING_VNET.desc: Attempt to reference VNET name without the VNET being present.
